About Me

Let me tell you a bit about myself...

Your Project In Safe Hands

Jane Spiers has had a "chequered" career encompassing rock n roll lighting designer, conference/ wedding designer, estate manager but has returned to her pashion for ceramic and glass kiln formed art, she had previously built as a major artist in New Zealand. She also has a healthy obsession with cake and christmas. Jane has recently moved from Norfolk to Sussex and is excited to get her new Brighton studio running full steam. She looks forward to getting to know the local community and becoming a part of the Sussex creative community.
